title: Can't access my emotes sill
body:
Since patch 7.22 I have not be able to access my emotes loadout. I play every day and every day I check to see if it's working. Every time I get the same error codes. Error code :EM01 & error code : EM05 I have only once been able to access them but got error code: EM03 and was not able to save. It "Feelsbadman" when you own them all and can't even use them. Please someone from Riot Games help me. Also I have tried the Full repair under the Troubleshooting in the General tab and rest restarting my client does not fix the issue/bug I'm experiencing.

Always yours,
Bowel Cramps
{{champion:26}}

replies.body: Hey, it does feelbad getting this issue.  :(  I wanted to let you know that you're not alone and a few players are getting this error.  It's a known issue and our devs are working on a fix!  In the meantime, though, restarting your client should fix things up for a bit!
